description: A design system characterized by a warm, soft color palette, a mix of serif and sans-serif typography, and rounded, friendly components. It aims for a clean, inviting, and organic user experience.

background.description: A very light, warm off-white or beige, used for the main page background.

text.description: A dark charcoal color for primary text, providing high contrast without being pure black.

orange.description: A vibrant, friendly orange used for highlighting key words or calls-to-action.

cardDefault.description: Pure white used for default interactive elements like selection buttons.

cardGreen.description: A muted, earthy green for content cards.

cardYellow.description: A warm, golden yellow for content cards.

cardDarkRed.description: A deep, brownish-red for content cards.

textOnDark.description: White text for use on colored card backgrounds.

textSubtle.description: A light gray for secondary text, like subtitles or captions.

heading.description: A classic, elegant serif font for large headlines. The accent word uses the same font but a different color.

subheading.description: A clean, readable sans-serif font for UI elements, button text, and card titles.

body.description: The standard sans-serif font for smaller descriptive text or captions.

grid.description: The overall layout is split into distinct sections. The left section is a structured, aligned grid for choices. The right section is a more organic, overlapping collage of cards.

imageOnly.description: A card that is filled entirely by an image.

textOverImage.description: A card with text overlaid on a full-bleed image, often with a gradient to ensure text legibility.

solidColor.description: A card with a solid background color from the component palette, containing text and sometimes small illustrations.

leftColumn.content: Primary question/action area with clear selection options.

rightColumn.content: Inspirational/contextual content presented as a dynamic visual collage.
rightColumn.alignment: Asymmetrical, overlapping elements to create depth and visual interest.
